title: Coverage Requirements Discovery (CRD)
description: Automatically queries payers to discover what documentation is required for prior authorization before submitting requests.

title: Document Template & Rules (DTR)
description: Auto-gathers required clinical notes, treatment plans, and lab reports from EMR/OIS to fulfill payer documentation requirements.

title: Prior Authorization Support (PAS)
description: Submits complete authorization packets to payers via FHIR APIs and tracks approval status in real-time.

title: Real-Time Authorization Status
description: Monitor authorization progress with live updates: Submitted, More Info Needed, Approved, or Denied with denial reasons.

title: mCODE Patient Profiles
description: Unifies EMR, OIS, imaging, and lab data into standardized mCODE oncology profiles for each patient automatically.

title: Clinical Pathway Builder
description: Create and customize institutional treatment protocols by disease site, staging, and technique with dose constraints and guidelines.

title: Protocol Conformance Check
description: Instantly verify that proposed treatment plans align with your institution's approved clinical protocols and guidelines.

title: Role-Based Task Assignment
description: Automatically assigns next steps to physicians, physicists, dosimetrists, and billing staff based on treatment plan approval workflow.

title: EMR FHIR Integration
description: Securely connects to Electronic Medical Records via FHIR APIs to extract patient demographics, diagnoses, and clinical notes.

title: OIS Treatment Plan Sync
description: Integrates with Oncology Information Systems to pull radiation therapy plans, dose calculations, and treatment parameters.

title: Local LLM Processing
description: Processes unstructured clinical notes using a private, secure AI model that runs entirely within your hospital network.

title: PHI Network Isolation
description: All patient health information stays within your hospital infrastructureâ€”no data ever transmitted to external AI services.

title: Role-Based Access Control
description: Granular permissions ensure clinicians, billing staff, and administrators only access patient data relevant to their role.

title: FHIR API Security
description: End-to-end encryption for all API communications with EMR, OIS, and payer systems following healthcare security standards.

title: Audit Trail Logging
description: Complete audit logs track every user action, data access, and system change for compliance and security monitoring.

title: Authorization Dashboard
description: Centralized view of all prior authorization requests with filtering by status, patient, provider, and approval timeline.

title: Denial Management
description: Track denial reasons, missing documentation, and resubmission requirements to reduce authorization delays and improve approval rates.

title: Clinical Decision Support
description: Provides evidence-based treatment recommendations and guideline concordance alerts during pathway selection and planning.
